N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7040.6 - Medical housing units and treatment areas

State Regulations
(a) Each individual occupancy housing unit
used to house inmates apart from the general population for purposes of medical
observation or treatment shall have a minimum of 80 square feet of floor
space. (b) Each multiple occupancy
housing unit used to house inmates apart from general population for purposes
of medical observation or treatment shall have a minimum of 80 square feet of
floor space per inmate in the sleeping area. Notes
